actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of Interior to establish the Boston Naval Shipyard Historic Site in the city of Boston, Mass., and for other purposes.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to establish the Boston Naval Shipyard Historic Site in the city of Boston, Massachusetts. Requires that the United States ship Constitution be located at Boston and be maintained by the Navy. Authorizes the appropriation of necessary sums to carry out this Act.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of Interior to establish the Boston Naval Shipyard Historic Site in the city of Boston, Mass., and for other purposes.
